dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, you have to tell me you saw this about Kazakhstan!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, you have to tell me you saw this about Kazakhstan!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: YES! Like, I literally gasped! Science cities, can you believe it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Y E S! Like, I literally gasped! Science cities, can you believe it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan's government is developing a concept for establishing science cities ("naukograds"), focusing on regions with a high concentration of research institutes and innovative industrial enterprises.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Naukograds! And Olzhas Bektenov, the Prime Minister, he's on it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Naukograds! And Olzhas Bektenov, the Prime Minister, he's on it!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan's government is developing a concept for establishing science cities ("naukograds")... At a government meeting, Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov tasked officials with drafting the plan...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! And Nurbek, the Minister, he said they're super effective globally!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! And Nurbek, the Minister, he said they're super effective globally!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Science cities have proven highly effective worldwide. When scientific universities are concentrated in one area, a unique environment and ecosystem emerge," Nurbek said at a government briefing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A whole unique ecosystem! He even mentioned Oppenheimer!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A whole unique ecosystem! He even mentioned Oppenheimer!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "...a unique environment and ecosystem emerge," Nurbek said... He referenced the film Oppenheimer as an example, noting that the scientists in the movie also created a kind of science city.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? Like, that's such a perfect example! But the places they already have!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? Like, that's such a perfect example! But the places they already have!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Kurchatov! Dude, they have a tokamak! A tokamak in Kazakhstan!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kurchatov! Dude, they have a tokamak! A tokamak in Kazakhstan!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first is Kurchatov, which has outstanding infrastructure, particle accelerators, and a tokamak”it’s hard to believe this exists in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! I was like, wait, what? Particle accelerators and everything!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! I was like, wait, what? Particle accelerators and everything!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first is Kurchatov, which has outstanding infrastructure, particle accelerators, and a tokamak...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then Alatau, near Almaty! A 120-hectare site!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then Alatau, near Almaty! A one hundred twenty-hectare site!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The second is the Alatau settlement near Almaty, where a 120-hectare site houses the Institute of Nuclear Physics...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, with the Institute of Nuclear Physics, a water-cooled reactor, and they're doing a radiomedicine cluster!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh, with the Institute of Nuclear Physics, a water-cooled reactor, and they're doing a radiomedicine cluster!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the Alatau settlement near Almaty, where a 120-hectare site houses the Institute of Nuclear Physics, a water-cooled reactor, and particle accelerators. We are currently developing a dedicated cluster for radiomedicine there," Nurbek explained.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Like, this isn't even just plans, these places are already happening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like, this isn't even just plans, these places are already happening.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! They're just formalizing what's already kind of there. It's wild!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! They're just formalizing what's already kind of there. It's wild!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder if they'll use these science cities to, uh, research the time zone change?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder if they'll use these science cities to, uh, research the time zone change?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, the minister spoke about research into the impact of Kazakhstan's time zone change.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, ha! You know Nurbek would be all over that!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, ha! You know Nurbek would be all over that!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For sure! That's gotta be on the agenda!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure! That's gotta be on the agenda!
